RootIndexPage.title: नि:शुल्क सुसमाचार भिडियो <underline>स्ट्रिमिङ</underline> पुस्तकालय।
RootIndexPage.description: २००० भन्दा बढी भाषाहरूमा सुसमाचार हेर्नुहोस्, सिक्नुहोस् र साझा गर्नुहोस्

ModernTestPage.title: Modern Test Page
ModernTestPage.description: This is a test page for the modern watch application. It demonstrates the new routing and proxy functionality.

feature1.title: Modern Architecture
feature1.description: Built with Next.js App Router and modern React patterns for optimal performance and developer experience.

feature2.title: Intelligent Routing
feature2.description: Advanced proxy routing that intelligently directs traffic to the appropriate backend services.

feature3.title: Responsive Design
feature3.description: Fully responsive design that works seamlessly across all devices and screen sizes.

ModernTestPage.footer: This page is served by the modern watch application through intelligent proxy routing.

DatadogErrorBoundary.anErrorOccurred: यो पृष्ठ लोड गर्दा एउटा त्रुटि भयो। कृपया पुन:ताजा गर्ने प्रयास गर्नुहोस्।
